verses.verse: Open<WH6605> your doors,<WH1817> Lebanon,<WH3844> that the fire<WH784> may devour<WH398> your cedars.<WH730>

Wail,<WH3213> fir tree,<WH1265> for the cedar<WH730> has fallen,<WH5307> because the stately<WH117> ones are destroyed.<WH7703> Wail,<WH3213> you oaks<WH437> of Bashan,<WH1316> for the strong<WH1208> forest<WH3293> has come down.<WH3381>

A voice<WH6963> of the wailing<WH3215> of the shepherds!<WH7462> For their glory<WH155> is destroyed:<WH7703> a voice<WH6963> of the roaring<WH7581> of young lions!<WH3715> For the pride<WH1347> of the Jordan<WH3383> is ruined.<WH7703>
Thus says<WH559> Yahweh<WH3068> my God:<WH430> "Feed<WH7462> the flock<WH6629> of slaughter.<WH2028>

Their buyers<WH7069> slaughter<WH2026> them,<WH816> and go unpunished. Those who sell<WH4376> them say,<WH559> <WH1288> 'Blessed be Yahweh,<WH3068> for I am rich;<WH6238>' and their own shepherds<WH7462> don't<WH2550> pity them.

For I will no more pity<WH2550> the inhabitants<WH3427> of the land,<WH776>" says<WH5002> Yahweh;<WH3068> "but,<WH4672> behold, I will deliver the men<WH120> everyone<WH376> into his neighbor<WH7453>'s hand,<WH3027> and into the hand<WH3027> of his king.<WH4428> They will strike<WH3807> the land,<WH776> and out of their hand<WH3027> I will not deliver them.<WH5337>"

So I fed<WH7462> the flock<WH6629> of slaughter,<WH2028> especially<WH3651> the oppressed<WH6041> of the flock.<WH6629> I took<WH3947> for myself two<WH8147> staffs.<WH4731> The one<WH259> I called<WH7121> "Favor,<WH5278>" and the other<WH259> I called<WH7121> "Union,<WH2254>" and I fed<WH7462> the flock.<WH6629>
I cut off<WH3582> the three<WH7969> shepherds<WH7462> in one<WH259> month;<WH3391> for my soul<WH5315> was weary<WH7114> of them,<WH5315> and their soul also loathed me.<WH973>

Then I said,<WH559> "I will not feed<WH7462> you.<WH4191> That which dies, let it die;<WH4191> and that which is to be cut off,<WH3582> let it be cut off;<WH3582> and let those who are left<WH7604> eat<WH398> each<WH802> other<WH7468>'s flesh.<WH1320>"
I took<WH3947> my staff<WH4731> Favor,<WH5278> and cut it apart,<WH1438> that I might break<WH6565> my covenant<WH1285> that I had made<WH3772> with all the peoples.<WH5971>
It was broken<WH6565> in that day;<WH3117> and thus the poor<WH6041> of the flock<WH6629> that listened<WH8104> to me knew<WH3045> that it was the word<WH1697> of Yahweh.<WH3068>

I said<WH559> to them,<WH5869> "If you think it best,<WH3051> give me my wages;<WH7939> and if not,<WH2308> keep them.<WH8254>" So they weighed for my wages<WH7939> thirty<WH7970> pieces of silver.<WH3701>

Yahweh<WH3068> said<WH559> to me,<WH7993> "Throw it to the potter,<WH3335> the handsome<WH145> price<WH3366> that I was valued at<WH3365> by them!<WH3947>" I took the thirty<WH7970> pieces of silver,<WH3701> and threw<WH7993> them to the potter,<WH3335> in the house<WH1004> of Yahweh.<WH3068>
Then I cut apart<WH1438> my other<WH8145> staff,<WH4731> even Union,<WH2254> that I might break<WH6565> the brotherhood<WH264> between Judah<WH3063> and Israel.<WH3478>
Yahweh<WH3068> said<WH559> to me,<WH3947> "Take for yourself yet again the equipment<WH3627> of a foolish<WH196> shepherd.<WH7462>

For,<WH6965> behold, I will raise up a shepherd<WH7462> in the land,<WH776> who will not visit<WH6485> those who are cut off,<WH3582> neither will seek<WH1245> those who are scattered,<WH5289> nor heal<WH7495> that which is broken,<WH7665> nor feed<WH3557> that which is sound;<WH5324> but he will eat<WH398> the flesh<WH1320> of the fat<WH1277> sheep,<WH6561> and will tear their hoofs<WH6541> in pieces.<WH6561>

Woe<WH1945> to the worthless<WH457> shepherd<WH7473> who leaves<WH5800> the flock!<WH6629> The sword<WH2719> will be on his arm,<WH2220> and on his right<WH3225> eye.<WH5869> His arm<WH2220> will be completely<WH3001> withered,<WH3001> and his right<WH3225> eye<WH5869> will be totally<WH3543> blinded!<WH3543>"
